      • optimisationVector

        public IndexedVector[] optimisationVector​(java.util.List<Flag> flags)
        Description copied from class: Problem
        Calculates the vector argument defined on Rn to the scalar objective function for this Problem.

        This arguments is represented by an IndexedVector.The indices in this IndexedVector are determined based on the respective NumericPropertyKeyword of each Flag contained in the flags. To fill the vector with data, only those parameters from this Problem will be used which are defined by the flags, e.g. if the flag associated with the HEAT_LOSS keyword is set to false, its value will be skipped when creating the vector.

        Overrides:
        optimisationVector in class Problem
        Parameters:
        flags - a list of Flag objects, which determine the basis of the search
        Returns:
        an IndexedVector object, representing the objective function.
        See Also:
        Problem.listedTypes()

      • assign

        public void assign​(IndexedVector params)
        Description copied from class: Problem
        Assigns parameter values of this Problem using the optimisation vector params. Only those parameters will be updated, the types of which are listed as indices in the params vector.
        Overrides:
        assign in class Problem
        Parameters:
        params - the optimisation vector, containing a similar set of parameters to this Problem
        See Also:
        Problem.listedTypes()
